scripts.clean: rm -rf static/dist && mkdir -p static/dist/js && mkdir -p static/dist/css && mkdir -p static/dist/fonts && mkdir -p static/dist/images
scripts.build:js: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-1 ] ] -t envify static/src/js/site.js -o static/dist/js/site.js
scripts.copy:fonts: cp node_modules/bootstrap/fonts/* static/dist/fonts/ && cp node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* static/dist/fonts/
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:js && npm run optimize:css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:images && npm run optimize
scripts.watch: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --raw "npm run watch:lint" "npm run watch:lint" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css"
